item.title: Project One Ring
item.description: Providing an overview of the toolset that we would need to predict networks across both time and space. The core idea behind this project is to produce a roadmap for grad student by grad students envisioning the future quests we could conceivably go on. The primary focus is on the need to develop a multi-faceted way to begin the conceptualisation network prediction as well as taking advantage of the growth of complex computational tools and the availability of data to facilitate the prediction process
